languages.text: {n}Церемониймейстер осекается и, не найдя ничего лучшего, сгибается в особо раболепном поклоне, после чего пятится в толпу, явно мечтая стать невидимым.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Церемониймейстер осекается и, не найдя ничего лучшего, сгибается в особо раболепном поклоне, после чего пятится в толпу, явно мечтая стать невидимым.{/n}

languages.text: {n}He stops abruptly. Lacking any better option, he bends into a particularly servile bow, then backs away, clearly wishing he could turn himself invisible.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Церемониймейстер осекается и, не найдя ничего лучшего, сгибается в особо раболепном поклоне, после чего пятится в толпу, явно мечтая стать невидимым.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}He stops abruptly, and, lacking a better option, bends in a particularly servile bow, then backs far away, clearly wishing he could turn invisible.{/n}
{n}He stops abruptly, and, lacking a better option, bends in a particularly servile bow, then backs far away, clearly wishing he could turn invisible.{/n}
{n}He stops abruptly. Lacking any better option, he bends into a particularly servile bow, then backs away, clearly wishing he could turn himself invisible.{/n}

{n}He stops abruptly. Lacking any better option, he bends into a particularly servile bow, then backs away, clearly wishing he could turn himself invisible.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Er hält abrupt inne. Aus Ermangelung besserer Optionen verbeugt er sich besonders unterwürfig und tritt dann einige Schritte zurück. Er wünscht sich ganz offensichtlich, er könnte sich unsichtbar machen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He stops abruptly. Lacking any better option, he bends into a particularly servile bow, then backs away, clearly wishing he could turn himself invisible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Er hält abrupt inne. Aus Ermangelung besserer Optionen verbeugt er sich besonders unterwürfig und tritt dann einige Schritte zurück. Er wünscht sich ganz offensichtlich, er könnte sich unsichtbar machen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Se detiene abruptamente. Sin una opción mejor, hace una profunda reverencia y se aleja, con un deseo evidente de volverse invisible.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He stops abruptly. Lacking any better option, he bends into a particularly servile bow, then backs away, clearly wishing he could turn himself invisible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Se detiene abruptamente. Sin una opción mejor, hace una profunda reverencia y se aleja, con un deseo evidente de volverse invisible.{/n}

languages.text: {n}彼は唐突に立ち止まった。他にいい選択肢がなく、彼はとりわけ卑屈にお辞儀をする。そして、明らかに消え入りたい様子で後ずさっていく。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He stops abruptly. Lacking any better option, he bends into a particularly servile bow, then backs away, clearly wishing he could turn himself invisible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は唐突に立ち止まった。他にいい選択肢がなく、彼はとりわけ卑屈にお辞儀をする。そして、明らかに消え入りたい様子で後ずさっていく。{/n}

languages.text: {n}祭仪大师赶紧住了嘴。他手足无措，奴颜婢膝地向你深鞠一躬，之后直起了身子。很显然，他希望能赶紧找个地缝钻进去。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He stops abruptly. Lacking any better option, he bends into a particularly servile bow, then backs away, clearly wishing he could turn himself invisible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}祭仪大师赶紧住了嘴。他手足无措，奴颜婢膝地向你深鞠一躬，之后直起了身子。很显然，他希望能赶紧找个地缝钻进去。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Il s'arrête brusquement, et, faute de mieux, s'incline de manière exagérée avant de reculer avec l'air de quelqu'un qui préférerait soudainement devenir invisible.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He stops abruptly. Lacking any better option, he bends into a particularly servile bow, then backs away, clearly wishing he could turn himself invisible.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Birdenbire duruyor. Daha iyi bir seçeneği kalmadığı için kul köle olurcasına yerlere eğiliyor. Ardından geri çekiliyor. O esnada görünmez olmayı dilediği aşikâr.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}He stops abruptly. Lacking any better option, he bends into a particularly servile bow, then backs away, clearly wishing he could turn himself invisible.{/n}
